name: Infinite Starfighter
description:
A small WIP prototype for a Roguelite Bullet Hell Shmup.

Right now there's just one game mode:

Hydra Mode: Killing an enemy will spawn 2 more. Enemies that make to the bottom edge of the screen will respawn at the top, and spawn an additional enemy. Try to defeat as many enemies as possible and stay alive as long as you can! (My personal record is 18). Try it out and leave me a comment with your high score!
